timeless_wealth.name: Timeless Wealth
timeless_wealth.description: Coins imbued with the power of time will follow you in your next lives. For each level of Timeless wealth, you start an additional with 1000 gold each.

historical_memory.name: Historical Deeds
historical_memory.description: Your deeds are remembered by time. For each level of Historical Deeds, you start with an additional 100 renown each.

chronic_insight.name: Chronic Insight
chronic_insight.description: Reduces the scaling of exp required by 1% (Additively) per each level

accelerated_perception.name: Accelerated Perception
accelerated_perception.description: Increases Game Speed by x0.1 for each level

temporal_adaptation.name: Temporal Adaptation
temporal_adaptation.description:
Your body adapts to the power of time better.

Decreases rebirths required to obtain temporal essence by 1 and Lifespan increases by 10 years for each level

eternal_learnings.name: Eternal Learnings
eternal_learnings.description: Break the limit of leveling up once with overflow experience. Overflowing experience will level up Job, Trainings, and Skills more than once. The amount of level ups depends on its level.

stored_miracles.name: Stored Miracles
stored_miracles.description: Gain miracles for every 100 luck level for every life. Dying during explorations consumes a miracle which will prevent your death.

making_of_a_fairy_queen.name: Making of a Fairy Queen
making_of_a_fairy_queen.description: Each time a fairy is defeated during battle, they will follow Luminara, increasing the max fairy buffs.

indomitable_will.name: Indomitable Will
indomitable_will.description: When dying during an exploration, choose to press on only once for each exploration.
